ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars

Subject: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

::Prowl/Striker/Ramulus::

Prowl nods slowly, letting what Bluestreak had said sink in. He blinks.

"Yes.... A military strategist. That's what I am," he grins, "But I had no 
idea it ran through lives."

He blinks remembering something. "Nice to see you again, brother!"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker runs into the charred clearing that the Ark was in, transforming into 
robot mode.

"All Maximals," he says over his comm-link, "We've got a new base! Pack up 
and move out."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus nods as he picks up Striker's transmission, walking into the bridge. 
He walks over to a functional console.

"Computer," he says, "I need a total backup of all of the Ark's recording 
chips and programming."

The computer beeps, getting to work on the project. Several moments later, a 
disk emerges, which Ramulus picks up and puts in a storage compartment.

Ramulus turns, walking off toward his quarters to pick up a few things.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl almost jumps at Striker's transmission.

"A new base!" he says, excitement clearly audible in his voice, "Let's get 
packed! We can repair this dump later," he says to Bluestreak, walking off 
into the Ark.
